project_overview.name: Customer Onboarding and Success Portal (COSP)
project_overview.description: A secure, personalized portal that streamlines the customer onboarding experience and improves time-to-value, self-service, and CSM efficiency.

feature_breakdown.description: Allow customers to log in to the COSP using their main SaaS product credentials.
acceptance_criteria: Customers can securely log in using their existing credentials
No additional login required for the COSP

feature_breakdown.description: Display a customized onboarding checklist based on the customer's subscription tier.
acceptance_criteria: Customers see a personalized onboarding checklist
Checklist items are tailored to the customer's subscription level

feature_breakdown.description: Integrate with the existing knowledge base API to allow seamless content searching and viewing.
acceptance_criteria: Customers can search and view knowledge base articles within the COSP
Search results are accurate and up-to-date

feature_breakdown.description: Display a dashboard showing the customer's adoption metrics (e.g., daily active users, feature usage count).
acceptance_criteria: Customers can view their key adoption metrics in the COSP
Dashboards are intuitive and easy to interpret

feature_breakdown.description: Provide a 'Contact CSM' button that pre-populates an email or a Zendesk ticket with customer details.
acceptance_criteria: Customers can easily contact their CSM from within the COSP
Ticket/email is pre-populated with relevant customer information

technical_architecture.data_flow: Users access the COSP front-end, which communicates with the back-end API. The API integrates with various third-party systems to retrieve and display customer data, onboarding content, and usage metrics.
security_considerations: Implement role-based access control (RBAC) for user permissions
Use industry-standard encryption (TLS 1.2+) for all data transmissions
Enforce password complexity requirements and enable multi-factor authentication

implementation_phases.description: Deliver the core functionality of the COSP, including secure login, personalized onboarding checklists, and knowledge base integration.
deliverables: Integration with identity provider and CRM

implementation_phases.description: Implement the adoption metrics dashboard to help customers track their usage and engagement with the main SaaS product.
Integrate the 'Contact CSM' functionality to enable efficient support and customer communication.

risk_analysis.description: Potential delays in third-party API integrations (e.g., Salesforce, Zendesk, Mixpanel)
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Engage with third-party vendors early, establish clear communication channels, and have contingency plans for delayed integrations

risk_analysis.description: Difficulty in defining personalized onboarding checklists based on subscription tiers
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Involve customer success and product teams to thoroughly understand the onboarding requirements for each tier, and plan for iterative development

risk_analysis.description: Scalability issues due to high concurrent user load
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Design the system architecture for scalability, leverage cloud-based infrastructure, and implement performance testing early in the development cycle

infrastructure_needs: Provisioning of cloud-based infrastructure (e.g., EC2, RDS, S3)
Setting up CI/CD pipelines for automated deployment
Implementing monitoring and logging solutions for the production environment

success_metrics.target_value: Decrease by 5 percentage points within 12 months of COSP launch
success_metrics.measurement_method: Monitor customer retention data from the CRM

success_metrics.target_value: Reduce average customer TTV from 30 days to 14 days within 6 months
success_metrics.measurement_method: Track feature adoption data from the product analytics system

success_metrics.target_value: Reduce time spent by CSMs on manual onboarding tasks by 25%
success_metrics.measurement_method: Survey CSMs and monitor their productivity metrics

success_metrics.target_value: Increase the percentage of support questions resolved via the portal to 40%
success_metrics.measurement_method: Analyze support ticket data and user engagement metrics
